1. Platform - Legacy-data Migration¶

1.1. Preparation¶

1.1.1. Configure the needed database connections:¶

local_settings.py

DATABASES = {

    'default': {
        ***
    },
    'legacy': {
        'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.mysql',
        'NAME': 'legacy_openbroadcast_medialibrary',
        'USER': 'openbroadcast',
        'PASSWORD': '********************',
        'HOST': '172.20.10.202',
    },
    'legacy_legacy': {
        'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.mysql',
        'NAME': 'legacy_openbroadcast',
        'USER': 'openbroadcast',
        'PASSWORD': '********************',
        'HOST': '172.20.10.202',
    },
}

1.1.2. Database¶

Note

Tables on “legacy-legacy” have to be altered!

ALTER TABLE `elgg_cm_master` ADD `migrated` DATETIME  NULL  AFTER `locked_userident`;

1.1.3. File storage/access¶

Files from the legacy-installation must be mounted on the application-server. Configuration:

LEGACY_STORAGE_ROOT = '/nas/prod/ml/'

Note

LEGACY_STORAGE_ROOT is the directory that contains the main media folder!!

1.2. Migration tools¶
